ModMetaData.name: [CP] Rimmu-Nation - Weapons
ModMetaData.author: Chicken Plucker
ModMetaData.description:
The second ammendment arrives in Rimworld, and it shall not be infringed. Features enough weapons from across the modern age that allows an economical collapse to escalate into a full-blown civil war.
Because when did gun free zones ever stop the pirates from firing into your colony?
RIMMU-NATION, DEFENDING YOUR RIGHTS.
Credits: Jecrell - Auger coding Saito Yui - TraderKinds .xml 1.1 update Various PimpMyGun artists
